definition.script: def dockerRun(command) { def config = '--config /home/root/jenkins.rb' sh "docker run --add-host=AZL-ChefServer-01:10.16.192.4 \ -v /home/jenkinsAdmin:/home/root chef/chefdk ${command} \ ${config}" } node { stage('Update Version Attribute') { dockerRun("knife exec -E 'nodes.find(\"name:azw-${env.Environment}-sql-01\") {|n| n.normal[\"dvo_user\"][\"hybDatabase\"][\"db_version\"]=\"${env.Version}\"; n.save}'") } stage('Kick-off DB Refresh') { withCredentials([usernamePassword(credentialsId: 'local_admin', usernameVariable: 'USERNAME', passwordVariable: 'PASSWORD')]) { dockerRun("knife winrm \"name:azw-${env.Environment}-sql-01\" \"chef-client -o cb_dvo_hybdatabase::refresh\" --winrm-user ${env.USERNAME} --winrm-password \'${env.PASSWORD}\'") } } }
